metadata.description: ICDEV.pl is a creative web studio specializing in creating modern, functional, and aesthetic websites for businesses from Poland and Ukraine. We offer a wide range of services, including landing page design, online stores, CRM systems, SEO, advertising, and technical support. Through a personalized approach to every project and the use of modern technologies, ICDEV.pl helps clients achieve their goals and succeed in the digital world.

greeting.h1: We create websites that inspire and sell
greeting.h4: Modern websites that sell – with full support and advertising.

items.title: Landing page development
items.description: We create modern and functional websites tailored to your needs.

about.subtitle: About us
about.description: We are a team of creative professionals who combine a passion for technology with experience in developing innovative web solutions. Our goal is to deliver high-quality services that help businesses stand out in the digital world. With a personalized approach to every project, we create websites and applications that not only meet our clients' expectations but also contribute to their success. We strive for perfection, using the latest technologies and best industry practices.

faq.subtitle: FAQ
faq.subsubtitle: You might be interested in reading

items.question: What is a web studio and what services does it offer?
items.answer: A web studio is a company specializing in designing and creating websites tailored to individual clients' needs.

items.question: How to choose the right web studio for my project?
items.answer: The choice depends on the studio's experience, client reviews, and portfolio.

items.question: What is the process of creating a website at your studio?
items.answer: The process includes analysis, design, implementation, and testing.

items.question: How long does it take to create a website?
items.answer: The timeline depends on the complexity of the project and ranges from 1 to 8 weeks.

items.question: What technologies do you use for website development?
items.answer: We use modern technologies such as HTML, CSS, MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node), Next.js, and more.
